obfuscation: Oh , he 's coming , he's coming .

original: I'm going to get to see Santa Claus!

obfuscation: Is it not wonderful ?

obfuscation: I'm going to see him .
original:
I'm
going to see him.

obfuscation: Let me look .
original: Let me look.

obfuscation: Oh , it 's getting bigger and _bigger_ and BIGGER !

Oh, it's getting

obfuscation: Hurray !
original: Hurray!

obfuscation: daddy 's coming !
original: daddy's coming!

obfuscation: daddy 's coming !
original: daddy's coming!

obfuscation: Now I can hear the bells .
original: Now I can hear the bells.

obfuscation: Oh , it 's coming closer and _closer_ and CLOSER .
original:
Oh, it's coming closer and _closer_

obfuscation: Look away , it 's going to hit the boat !
original: Look out, it's going to hit the boat!

obfuscation: He flew right by us .
original: He flew right by us.

obfuscation: Maybe he did n't understand the boat .
original: Maybe he didn't see the boat.

obfuscation: Oh , nowadays he is n't coming at all .
original: Oh, now he isn't coming at all.

obfuscation: Yes , he is .
original: Yes, he is.

obfuscation: He 's landed right over there .
original: He's landed right over there.

obfuscation: Here he comes ; here he comes !
original: Here he comes; here he comes!

obfuscation: Here we are , Santa Claus .
original: Here we are, Santa Claus.

obfuscation: This is the place .
original: This is the place.

obfuscation: Come in .
original: Come in.

obfuscation: Merry Christmas , Santa Claus , merry Christmas !
original: Merry Christmas, Santa Claus, merry Christmas!

obfuscation: Hello , there -- where are you ?
original: Hello, there--where are you?

obfuscation: It 's thus dark I ca n't see a single thing .
original: It's so dark I can't see a single thing.

obfuscation: Hello , daddy ; merry Christmas .
original: Hello, daddy; merry Christmas.

obfuscation: Hello yourself .
original: Hello yourself.

obfuscation: Merry Christmas to you , besides .
original: Merry Christmas to you, too.

obfuscation: Are you all ready for me ?
original: Are you all ready for me?

obfuscation: Yes , it 's all ready .
original: Yes, it's all ready.

obfuscation: The magical tree is just waiting for your touch to turn into a actual Christmas tree .
original:
The magical tree is just waiting for

obfuscation: Oh , we 're going to get a real Christmas tree .
original: Oh, we're going to have a real Christmas tree.

original: Hello, who's this young person?

obfuscation: This is Anita .
original: This is Anita.

obfuscation: And why is n't she sound asleep like the rest of the children ?
original:
And why isn't she sound asleep like the rest of the

obfuscation: She 's such a good fiddling girl that I told her she could stay up with me and wait until you came .
original:
She's such a good little girl that I told her she could

obfuscation: Oh , ho ; so you 've made a hit with my boy , Jack Frost , have you ?
original:
Oh, ho; so you've made a hit with my boy, Jack

obfuscation: Well , if that 's the case , I guess you can stay .
original: Well, if that's the case, I guess you can stay.

obfuscation: But all of the children would like to see you , Santa Claus .
original: But all of the children would like to see you, Santa Claus.

obfuscation: See , they 've prepared the candle and the wreath of holly and the star of Bethlehem all for you .
original:
See, they've prepared the candle and the wreath of holly and the star
of Bethlehem all for you.

obfuscation: There 's Sergius and Tomasso and Hulda and Meeny and Hans and Yakob and Neelda and Ah Goo and Sano San and Mieze and the leetla Dutch twins , Klinker and Schwillie Willie Winkum .
original:

original: They've all been awfully good children.

original:
